item.title: Ozzy Osbourne Posthumously Scores 10th Top 10 Album With ‘The Essential Ozzy’
item.description: Ozzy Osbourne’s legacy continues to cement itself on the charts as fans turn to his music while mourning his death. Osbourne died at age 76 on July 22 after a years-long struggle with Parkinson’s dise
